apidoc:function.name: get-splits
apidoc:function.apidoc:summary: This function returns (forest_id, record_count, host_name) tuples usable with the MarkLogic Connector for Hadoop to generate input splits in advanced input mode.

apidoc:params.apidoc:param: A fully searchable path expression to define document scope for the splits.
A cts:query specifying the search to perform for the splits.

apidoc:usage.p: Use this function to construct a split query in advanced input mode. For details, see the MarkLogic Connector for Hadoop Developer's Guide.
